item.title: [PI] skillcape emote button
item.dc:creator: @dgk_all_day1 dgk_all_day
item.description:
@dgk_all_day1 wrote:

Im trying to add skillcapes to my pi based server i added a button to client side and this to server side but when i do the emote’s it does barrage emote, can any1 help me.

maybe gfx or emote’s not in client how would i add the effects for these?
google’d no results

[code] case 154:

if (!c.skillCapeEquipped()) {

                   c.sendMessage("You need a skill cape equiped to perform this animation.");

                    return;

                }

                if (c.playerEquipment[c.playerCape] == 9747 || c.playerEquipment[c.playerCape] == 10639 || c.playerEquipment[c.playerCape] == 9748) { //attack

                    c.gfx0(823);

                    c.startAnimation(4959);

}

                if (c.playerEquipment[c.playerCape] == 9753 || c.playerEquipment[c.playerCape] == 10641 || c.playerEquipment[c.playerCape] == 9754) { //Defence

                    c.gfx0(824);

                    c.startAnimation(4961);

                }
